titles.title: Better Bracket Act of 1998
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce individual income taxes by increasing the amount of taxable income which is taxed at the lowest income tax rate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/11/1998--Introduced. Better Bracket Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the tax imposed and increase the amount of income subject to the 15 percent tax bracket for joint returns and surviving spouses, heads of households, other unmarried individuals, married individuals filing separately, and estates and trusts.
